file_content.text: Ha! Republic worse than Empire. Smell death and come in anyway.
You can keep this wreck. I came for the cargo manifest.
I don't want any trouble.
Republic soldiers don't freeze like Imperials do.
Don't push me.
Many bodies here... maybe they look better posed. I start with you.
Looks like you hunt and kill just fine on your own.
You don't need the droids.
Are you saying those are HK droids?
Hunter-Killer?
I'm saying HK droids belong to me.
Time to die, like all the rest.
You stupid know-nothing! I not explain anything.
Ship and cargo Dread Masters' now. Especially Hunter-Killer droids.
Yes, this ship is all yours... for the five seconds it'll take me to kill you.
Guess again. [Attack]
Leaving a bunch of killer droids in the Dread Masters' hands? Not on my list of things to do today.
I can't allow that.
Would you consider letting all this go? I'd rather not fight you for it.
Please reconsider.
Hah! Jedi makes jokes before dying.
No, your day only about dying.
Look around. Imperials come to take ship. All dead. Pathetic.
What's so important about this ship that you're willing to fight over it?
Why kill over this?
I love what you've done with the place. If you enjoy killing Imperials, you should come over to our side.
Nice work.
You right. Now I show you.
Too late for talking. You make big mistake.
Republic not worthy. Full of fools.
